subject: How to Test Private Methods Inside a Class
msgSnippet: Hi, I quite new to this JUnit technology, so please bear with me. I am struck where I have to test some private methods inside a class. Situation is like that,
messageBody:
Hi,

I quite new to this JUnit technology, so please bear with me.

I am struck where I have to test some private methods inside a class.
Situation is like that, inside my class all methods are private except
one through which we access the service.

I welcome any ideas in this regards.

Thanks & Regards
Bipin
